articles.title: Putin will not attend Brics summit - South African presidency - BBC
articles.description: The announcement ends months of speculation over the Russian president's planned visit.
articles.content:
Russia's president will not attend a summit in South Africa next month, according to the country's presidency.
The announcement comes after South Africa's leader said any attempt to arrest Vladimir … [+2885 chars]
